title: Unable to connect to Work wireless network-PEAP Phase 2 Authentication option for 'None' disappeared
content:
I just upgraded from Pixel 1 to Pixel 4a, and want to connect to my Work wireless network. However, I can't because 'None' is missing from the selectable list of Phase 2 Authentication. It is present on my personal Pixel 1 and work Galaxy S9.

There is another recent thread about this but it was locked with no comments
